page.title: 07 BACKWORTH MINERS' WELFARE.
page.content: The We as a club.People go to the Welfare to drink and take part in sporting activities.Golf is the popular activity at the Welfare. It has a 9 hole golf course.There is a cricket pitch which is used by Backworth Cricket Team who play in the Northumberland Cricket League.There are two bowling greens and two football pitches.One pitch is kept for special matches and the other is open to the public.Inside the club people can play pool,snooker and darts The Welfare is sometimes used for wedding receptions and there is a dance floor.The Welfare is surrounded by gard floor.The Welfare is surrounded by gardens and parkland which is open to the public.
